name: Forgotten Kodama: The Seed of Life
name_original: Forgotten Kodama: The Seed of Life
description:
Forgotten Kodama is an adventure game in which you can explore, crawl on the walls and ceiling, engage in thrilling fist fights and solve intricate puzzles.

Help Uzume, the last Kodama, recover the esence of the Tree of Life stolen by the Yomi and restore the world's balance!

Forgotten Kodama was a student project developed back in 2012 now made available for everyone to try and enjoy.

Developed by Hugging Cactus:

  • Dano Alonso
  • Albert Badosa
  • Luis Miguel Blanco
  • Adrián Miguel
  • Hernán Ojuel

With the collaboration of:

  • Víctor Ojuel (script)
  • Alex Rodríguez Flaqué (original music)
  • Pierre Houzé (french localization)
Forgotten Kodama postmortem

Hugging Cactus 2012
